data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the Freebox for updates (10-300 seconds)
data_description.reboot_interval_days: How many days between reboots (0-30, 0 disables)

data_description.temp_refresh_duration: How long to maintain fast polling after a command (30-120 seconds, default 120)
